delete $1{journal_count} journal(s)?: Do you really want to delete $1 document(s)?
delete journal No. $1{journal_number} of: Do you really want to delete $1 with date of $2?
post $1 journal(s)?: Do you want to post $1 document(s)?
post journal No. $1{journal_number} of $: Do you want to post $1 with date of $2?
unpost $1 journal(s)?: Do you want to cancel $1 document(s)?
unpost journal No. $1{journal_number} of: Do you want to cancel $1 with date of $2?
